subject: RE: [junit] How to test an EJB?
msgSnippet: Try getting the book JUnit Recipes By J.B Rainsberger Chapter 11 is all about testing EJB Hope that helps, -Kamal. ... From: junit@yahoogroups.com
messageBody:
Try getting the book "JUnit Recipes" By J.B Rainsberger

Chapter 11 is all about testing EJB

Hope that helps,
-Kamal.
